# MTLTriangleFillMode.fill

**Case**

Rasterize triangle and triangle strip primitives as filled triangles.

## Declaration

```swift
case fill
```

## Fill modes

- **MTLTriangleFillMode.lines**: Rasterize triangle and triangle strip primitives as lines.
